text: We have about 200 openings at Quicken Loans. We have an amazing culture, have won numerous awards as the best place to work in Technology in America several times among other things. We're hiring full stack software devs, server, analyst, QA, DBA, you name it. Feel free to email me your resume and I'll get it fast tracked: keithelder@quickenloans.com Feel free to review our career site at https://quickenloanscareers.com/
